title: Latest WorldTour Transfers: No ‘A-List’ Blockbusters as Teams Shore Up Bases for 2025
content:
The 2025 WorldTour transfer season sees key strategic moves, with Ineos Grenadiers, Lidl-Trek, Israel-Premier Tech, and Astana-Qazaqstan adding firepower.

Read the full article at Latest WorldTour Transfers: No ‘A-List’ Blockbusters as Teams Shore Up Bases for 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
